evidence.text: Person A: I prefer the Italian, I think. It's more suitable, no?
Person B: I have to do some research but-

Person A: Sir, is this really what you imagined? Am I missing something? When Harry called, he described this to me as a personal project. If this is what we ultimately settle on, something of this scale, the timeline would need to be considerably adjusted.
Person B: How the hell did you find these people, Leslie?!
Person A: You don't utter another goddamned word to the rail company until Michael can advise.
Person B: I'm hoping to have more answers for you soon, sir.

Person A: What would you like me to do in the meantime?
Person A: Our crew.
Person A: Laszlo, in the interest of transparency, before I came to retrieve you, I had already advised Mr. Van Buren to cut his losses-
